scripts.db:up: npm run db:start && npm run db:copy && echo Waiting... && sleep 60 && npm run db:create
scripts.db:down: docker kill RRdb ; docker network rm RRdb-Network
scripts.db:update: npm run db:copy && npm run db:create
scripts.db:start: docker network create RRdb-Network && docker run --rm -d --name RRdb --hostname cassandra --network RRdb-Network cassandra
